QuestData.Title: Battle for Stormheim
QuestData.Description:
Your efforts have destroyed the Legion's forces upon Shield's Rest, yet they continue to press their assault.
There is only one way to end this - you must venture into the midst of our foe, find their commander, and remove his vile head!
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Lord Commander Alexius in Stormheim.

Objectives.Objective: Speak with the Val'kyr of Odyn
